https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/307SlbUlcegJG1PG9X35kunP0R.jpg Thirty-year-old Keith Kavanagh (Joel Thomas Hynes) ekes his way through life in a small town. A hard-drinking hooligan, he keeps his ragged collection of poetry a closely guarded secret... as secret as his regret for the shattered relationship with his father. When Keith meets the darkly exotic Natasha (Myl√®ne Savoie), his life is changed forever. Down to the Dirt
